summary: Timeline_23 documents managing panic disorder and agoraphobia with professional help.

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I feel empty inside All this therapy for nothing. I'm completely numb My therapist reminded me how far I've come. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm not giving up
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I push everyone away when I'm depressed. Everyone would be better off without me I'm spiraling out of control Trying to communicate better with my partner. practiced my coping strategies I apologized and explained what I'm going through. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I can't do anything right I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I isolated myself from all my friends Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. took my medication as prescribed Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I'm disgusting I gave up trying My partner has been incredibly supportive. tried a new coping mechanism Learning to accept help and love. I'm building a support system
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I'm tired of existing I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I gave up trying Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I acknowledge my progress
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The new medication makes me feel numb. I'm tired of existing I don't feel like myself anymore. I don't care about anything anymore Scheduled an appointment to discuss adjusting the dosage. called the crisis hotline Keeping a mood journal to track changes. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I have no reason to keep going I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I don't care about anything anymore Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. asked for support Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I'm working on self-compassion
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I have no reason to keep going I gave up trying Managed to shower and eat breakfast. used my DBT skills Small steps are still steps forward. Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. I hate myself so much I stopped taking my medication Started setting better boundaries at work. practiced my coping strategies Learned to say no to extra projects. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I hate myself so much I hate myself for it. I isolated myself from all my friends Called my therapist this morning joined a support group and we talked through it. I'm being patient with myself
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. I'm disgusting I don't care about anything anymore Went outside for 10 minutes. tried a new coping mechanism Called a friend. Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I hate myself so much My performance has been terrible. I'm completely numb Met with HR about accommodations. used my DBT skills They're being supportive. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. reached out to my therapist Therapy is really helping. Small steps are still progress Still have rough days. I'm broken beyond repair But they're getting less frequent. I hurt myself again
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I'm tired of existing I've been drinking to cope Using the distraction techniques I learned. set healthy boundaries Reached out to my crisis support instead. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I'm worthless and pathetic Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I've been drinking to cope But I remembered my safety plan set healthy boundaries and texted my sponsor. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
